section.p: After creating the management, high availability (HA), and virtual tunnel endpoint (VTEP) networks, you should verify connectivity before installing the F5 BIG-IP driver/plug-in. When the PING test passes on both Controller and Compute nodes, you can install the F5 LBaaS Driver/Plug-in.

ol.li: Launch a virtual machine (VM) on your mgmt (management) network.
To ping an IP address, from the Controller node, run:#ping <ipaddress_of_Compute_node>
Repeat these steps for Compute node.

section.note: Repeat these steps for the HA (high availability) and VTEP (virtual tunnel endpoint) networks before installing the LBaaS (load balancing as a service) driver.
